name: Rosemary Butternut Bisque
keywords: appetizer, butternut squash, chicken broth, rosemary, fall
recipeIngredient: 2 medium butternut squash, peeled, seeds and fibers scooped out, cut into 1/2-inch cubes
6 cups chicken broth, homemade or low-sodium canned

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees. Place the squash on a baking sheet and roast until tender, about 25 minutes. Transfer to a large saucepan and add the chicken broth, rosemary and orange zest. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes.
Place the mixture in a food processor and process until smooth. Stir in the salt and pepper. Ladle the soup into bowls and swirl a little of the cream into each bowl if desired. Serve immediately.
